text: Klitschko put Thompson on the canvas with a big right hand near the end of the fifth round at Stade de Suisse, and the 40 - year - old American southpaw never recovered. The Ukrainian champion dropped Thompson again in the sixth, and referee Sam Williams gave the challenger a standing count before stopping the fight at 2 : 56.
title: Wladimir Klitschko stopped Tony Thompson in the sixth round to keep a comfortable hold on his WBA, IBF and WBO heavyweight title belts on Saturday.
